price: (24) [Saying], "There will surely not enter it today upon you [any] poor person."
arabic: أَن لَّا يَدۡخُلَنَّهَا ٱلۡيَوۡمَ عَلَيۡكُم مِّسۡكِينٞ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: an lā yadkhulannahā al-yawma ʿalaykum mis'kīnun
